A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars film since Attack of the Clones. I haven't been this upset with a movie since Indiana Jones Kingdom of the Crystal Skull. To say disappointing would be an understatement. I've been a Star Wars fan all my life and I even liked Force Awakens\, but this ruined the new Trilogy for me. This was a useless movie that tied up no lose ends. I would say more but I'm afraid I might die of exhaustion... #LukeDeservedBetter
